comments: horrible!!! I can\'t barely to keep up with him, I have to drop this class, and retake other chemistry class with DIFFERENT teacher i got 3.4!!!! what is wrong with this picture!!! he make this toooo difficult for us... Be Aware do not take him! trust me!!

Bozin needs to find a new career. He was very helpful, but he just doesn\'t have the knack for teaching. We went from a full class, to approx. 9 students left at the end of the semester. We all struggled right up to the end. Nice guy, bad teacher. Also, he was VERY disorganized. You never knew what or when something was expected from you.

OK, this teacher knows his subject but does NOT know how to teach it! He is also very disorganized. Try to get on his good side, as he does play favorites. In my opinion, he shouldn\'t be a teacher. The final review was worthless because a lot of things on the test were not on the review. Do not take him! I gained no knowledge from this class!

Professor Bozin was one of the worst professors I have ever had. He understood Chemistry perfectly but had no idea how to teach it. Anyone who had a question in class was made to look like a fool, he laughed at the questions. THIS WAS AN INTRO CLASS!! And he definitely was one to play favorites. Save yourself the hassel and do not take this class!

Professor Bozin is a real cool guy once you get in his class and know him a bit. funny person overall and cares about his students and their success. the class is no fluff off however you must really work your rear end off to get a reasonable grade in this class. Tests are HARD and sometimes can be confusing. Overall, I would take him again!

I took him at hfcc and it was the worst class ever. He doesnt explain things enough. puts things on tests he doesnt go over. no study guides. in his intro to chem class its like a chem 3 class. i hated going and so did the people in his class i talked too.
great teacher made class enjoyable willing to work with you and make sure you understand class is very laid back i dont like chemistry but look forward to class

do not take this class unless you absolutly have to. The class started with 31 kids, and ended with 11. Starts off easy, but its real hard bc he doesnt know how to teach the material. GET OUT if u can
